Docs.summary: Retrieves the path to sub directory inside the work directory with the name "logicalDirectoryName".
Docs.returns: The path to sub directory with name logicalDirectoryName inside work directory
Docs.remarks: Throws an exception if logicalDirectoryName is not found under work directory. Otherwise will return directory path WorkDirectory\logicalDirectoryName which is a symbolic link to directory specified with Name under LogicalDirectories Section of ClusterManifest. for example: if you have specified and call to this method with directoryName "Foo" will return you path WorkDirectory\Foo. Any writes made to returned path will go to D:\Foo\NodeId\ApplicationType_ApplicationVersion. This method is case insensitive so even if you say directoryName foo it will still return you directory path WorkDirectory\Foo.
